Name: Archon Katrina Steiner
Details:
Born 2976.

Although not in the line of succession, Katrina become Archon after deposing her uncle, Duke Alessandro Steiner in 3007 in a coup provoked after he attempted to have his niece murdered by Loki agents. In 3010 Katrina gave birth to her only child, Melissa Steiner, the daughter of Arthur Luvon, who she married after becoming Archon. Her reign has been marked by her Peace Proposals, which have led to the alliance with House Davion to create the Federated Commonwealth.
